bibl.title: Antinoopolis October 2010. On the Church beside the Eastern Gate.
bibl.note: 1.1. The church proper and the crypt. - 1.2. Burials in the nave. - 1.3. The atrium in the West. - 2. A late antique police camp in front of the Roman quarries at Dayr Sumbat.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis October 2010. On the Church beside the Eastern Gate.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. III = Aegyptus 90 (2010 [2013]) pp. 165-181, 8 pll.
